name: Farewell Call
description:
The Farewell Call is a short walking-sim that takes place in a dystopian future. The main character, Daniel relives his memories in his abandoned New England hometown. This game is aimed at an immersive, interactive experience. The Farewell Call focuses on teaching people the future effects of global warming.

Explore the town and interact with objects to figure out what happened.

Mouse and keyboard only

Extract and Click Senior Project to play

By: Haley Lee & Gregory Johnson

Twitter: @haylee3D @gregjohn456
